mapper.select: select A.CO_ID, A.OGAN_CODE, A.OGAN_LEV, A.OGAN_ESTB_DATE, B.RESC_KEY_VALUE OGAN_NAME, A.RESC_KEY, A.OGAN_CLS_DATE, A.HIGH_OGAN_CODE, A.HIGH_OGAN_LEV, A.OGAN_TYPE, A.OGAN_DESC from om001m A LEFT JOIN gw.om002m B ON ( B.LOCALE = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and B.RESC_KEY = A.RESC_KEY) where CO_ID = #{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SYSDATE() between OGAN_ESTB_DATE and OGAN_CLS_DATE order by OGAN_LEV, OGAN_CODE, HIGH_OGAN_LEV, HIGH_OGAN_CODE
mapper.insert: insert into om001m(CO_ID, OGAN_CODE, OGAN_LEV, OGAN_ESTB_DATE, OGAN_NAME, RESC_KEY, OGAN_CLS_DATE, HIGH_OGAN_CODE, HIGH_OGAN_LEV, OGAN_TYPE, OGAN_DESC) values (#{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oganCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oganLev,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oganEstbDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{oganName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rescKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oganClsDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,#{highOganCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{highOganLev,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oganType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{oganDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
